ja493:11.4: vidalasūpiyo → siṅgiṃ bidalasūpiyo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | siṅgividalasūpiyo (sya1ed, sya2ed) | siṅgīveraṃ lasūpiyo (mr) siṅginti siṅgiverādikaṃ uttaribhaṅgaṃ. vidalasūpiyoti muggasūpādayo (aṭṭha.)
ja493:12.1: tattha bhutvā khāditvā → bhutvā ca pivitvā ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja493:17.2: ca kambalā → uddiyāne ca kambale (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | uddhiyāni ca kambalā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja493:22.1: tassānādiyitvā → tassa anāditvā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | tassa anādiyitvā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja493:25.4: haneyyārisakaṃ → haneyya disataṃ (bj) | haneyya disakaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
